home.title: Software Engineer
home.description: I build accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for the web.

about.title: Building digital products, brands, and experiences
about.intro1: I'm a passionate software engineer who loves creating innovative solutions. My journey in technology began with curiosity about how things work, which led me to explore various aspects of software development.
about.intro2: With full-stack development experience, I've had the opportunity to work on projects ranging from web applications to AI solutions. I focus on creating user-centric applications that solve real problems.

senior.title: Senior Software Engineer
senior.description: Led development of web applications using SpringBoot and Java. Delivered to clients and mentored junior developers.
achievements: Optimized system performance, improving response time by 30%
Designed and implemented new microservices architecture

fullstack.title: Full Stack Developer
fullstack.description: Developed enterprise PLM systems using React, Java, SpringBoot and other technologies.
